tilHome.title: Today I Learned
tilHome.subtitle: Keep learning new things... (almost) everyday.
tilHome.noTil: There's anything registered for this language
tilHome.description: "Today I learned" is a common thread in the tech community where people share what they've learned in a simpler and shorter version rather than a full blog post. You can imagine it as a "Knowledge pills".

blog.description: Project case studies, thought processes & design thinking, software development strategies, and techniques, best practices, learnings, personal life and opinions and everything in between.

404.title: 404 - Page not found
404.subtitle: This is clearly not the page you’re looking for.
404.description: Looks like the page you’re looking for does not exist, or the link that got you here is outdated or broken. Click on the logo to return to home page.

search.stats: {results, plural, one {# result} other {# results}} found in {milliseconds}ms

tag.title: All posts for "{tag}"
tag.description: Check all blog posts I've written related to "{tag}".

cv.description1: To provide a better experience and ease the maintainability of a single source of true, I keep my CV in a public Google Docs file.
cv.description2: From there, you'll be able to print or export in the extension you need.
